alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 02 at 5:20AM EDT until May 02 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow will redevelop from the east during the morning, then diminish in the mid to late afternoon. Expect snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, greatest over higher terrain from Rockland through Bergland to the Porcupine Mountains. Right along Lake Superior, little or no snow accumulation will occur. * WHERE...Ontonagon and Gogebic Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult where steadier snow occurs. Otherwise, plan on slippery travel conditions. With the wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, gusty winds could break some tree branches, causing sporadic power outages. The snow will also be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
